psychiatric.description: Has a psychiatric exam been performed?

upset.description: In the past month, how often has patient been upset because of something that happened unexpectedly?

control.description: In the past month, how often has patient felt  unable to control the important things in their life?

stress.description: In the past month, how often has patient felt nervous and 'stressed'?

stress_def.description: In the past month, what types of stress has patient encountered?

confident.description: In the past month, how often has patient felt confident about ability to handle personal problems?

going_your_way.description: In the past month, how often has patient felt that things were going their way?

coping.description: In the past month, how often has patient found that they could not cope with all the things that they had to do?

irritation.description: In the past month, how often has patient been able to control irritations in their life?

on_top.description: In the past month, how often has patient felt that they were on top of things?

anger.description: In the past month, how often has patient been angered because of things that were outside of their control?

difficulties.description: In the past month, how often has patient felt difficulties were piling up so high that they could not overcome them?
